verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) "Had it not been <S%H1961><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H7945><s%> was on our side," Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> say, <S%H559><s%>
"Had it not been <S%H1961><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H7945><s%> was on our side, When men <S%H120><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> us;
Then <S%H233><s%> they would have swallowed <S%H1104><s%> us alive, <S%H2416><s%> When their anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against us;
Then <S%H233><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> would have engulfed <S%H7857><s%> us, The stream <S%H5158><s%> would have swept <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> our soul; <S%H5315><s%>
Then <S%H233><s%> the raging <S%H2121><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> would have swept <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> our soul. <S%H5315><s%> "
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who <S%H7945><s%> has not given <S%H5414><s%> us to be torn <S%H2964><s%> by their teeth. <S%H8127><s%>

Our soul <S%H5315><s%> has escaped <S%H4422><s%> as a bird <S%H6833><s%> out of the snare <S%H6341><s%> of the trapper; <S%H3369><s%> The snare <S%H6341><s%> is broken <S%H7665><s%> and we have escaped. <S%H4422><s%>
Our help <S%H5828><s%> is in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
